  "HK$",

  "."
 }

  "\u221e",
  "\ufffd",
 }

  "",
  "",
  ""
 }

    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
          "",
          ""
            }
            DateTimeElements:intvector{
          1,
          
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
          "",
          "",
          "H:mm:ss",
          "",
          "EEEE, d MMMM, yyyy",
          "",
          "",
          "d/M/yyyy",
          "",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                  "Sun",
                  "Mon",

                  "Thu",
                  "Fri",
                  "Sat"
                    }

                  "Sunday",

                  "Saturday"
                    }
                }
            }

                format{
